QUERY.SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MSP_BASICADVALERT WHERE KRISFLYER_NUM =?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MSP_BASICADVALERT WHERE (KRISFLYER_NUM ='' OR KRISFLYER_NUM IS NULL) AND CHANNEL_ID=?
SELECT OFFICE_ID FROM taw_posdetails where COUNTRY_CODE=? AND POS=?
SELECT ALTEA_REF FROM TAW_KRISCOM_ALTEA_REF where KRISCOM_REF=?
SELECT MAX(SEQ_NO) AS SEQ_NO FROM TAW_TKT_STATUS_DETL WHERE REQ_STATUS='Inprogress' AND PNR_NUM=?
SELECT MAX(SEQ_NO) AS SEQ_NO FROM TAW_TKT_STATUS_DETL
UPDATE TAW_TKT_STATUS_DETL SET NO_PAX_TKT_SUCCESS=?,COMPLETE_DAT_TIME=SYSDATE, REQ_STATUS=?,REMARKS=? where PNR_NUM=? and REQ_STATUS='Inprogress' and SEQ_NO=?
select count(*) as COUNT from taw_tkt_status_detl where PNR_NUM=? and REQ_STATUS='Inprogress'
